overview:
Chris Oltyan has worked for over 12 years managing teams bringing products to the market in the entertainment and simulation industries. He has worked in a wide variety of roles and been key part of over 24 successful product launches. These products involved a wide range of properties including Disney, Warner Bros, Cartoon Network, and The Pokemon Company.

A Certified Scrum Master, Chris Oltyan an experienced practitioner of Agile development processes and has spearheaded Agile transformations at numerous companies. He has substantial experience in introducing Agile techniques to product teams, management, and clients, providing a framework for all parties to effective work together.

In addition to his production experience, Chris Oltyan has been a founder at six startups, and has orchestrated exits on three. He started his first company while at Carnegie Mellon University, which earned him the Enterprise award for Entrepreneurship. He also has taken time to share his knowledge, volunteering as a Mentor for Women in Games International, and has been an active volunteer with the International Game Developer Association serving on numerous committees.
